snippet: A plan to keep Fiat factories open by focusing on pricey exports has been questioned by analysts who doubt that the company can play in the same league as its rivals.
abstract: Plan to keep Fiat factories open by focusing on pricey exports of its Alfa Romeo and Maserati brands is being questioned by analysts who doubt that company can play in same league as its rivals like BMW and Mercedes.
lead_paragraph: A plan to keep Fiat factories open by focusing on pricey exports has been questioned by analysts who doubt that the company can play in the same league as its rivals.

headline.main: Fiat’s Plan to Go Upscale Is Met With Skepticism
headline.print_headline: Fiat’s Plan to Go Upscale Is Met With Skepticism
